name: Die with friends
description:
Summary

Die with friends is a 2 players top down shooter of in which you have to survive various waves of enemies on totally unique maps.

5 Unique maps

  • Desert
  • Forest
  • Greek city
  • Victorian city
  • Space

Manage your economy

Do you plan to spend all your money and not leave anything to your friend? go ahead!

Teamwork is the key

Teamwork is the key to achieving our goals, both in real life and in Die with friends!

Feedback

If you have any proposal, comment or suggestion about the development of the game, or just want to ask me something, do not doubt to do so.

Twitter: @sefitoGG

Gmail: sefonuara@gmail.com
